content: playing in the poppies is a pretty little granny square that is compatible with 80% of my other patterns the poppy is one of my favorite flowers and it s medicinal tons of pictures and a full youtube tutorial come with this pattern with a 4mm hook and worsted weight yarn my squares come out approximately 5 ½ x 5 ½ inches unblocked i recommend doing a test square to gauge how big yours will be as sizes vary with different yarn brands and colors even if the colors are all the same brand and weight list of my compatible granny square patterns maryjane granny s eye - alternate version alien head grandpa s magic toadstool night owl granny burger strawberry pop-up s the great granny pumpkin classic candy corn
